title: Node.js and Express.js Fundamentals
goal: Understand the fundamentals of Node.js and Express.js to build a basic server.

title: RESTful APIs and Middleware
goal: Learn to build RESTful APIs with Express.js and understand middleware.

title: Introduction to PostgreSQL
goal: Learn the basics of PostgreSQL and how to interact with it.

title: Connecting Node.js with PostgreSQL
goal: Learn how to connect a Node.js application to a PostgreSQL database.

title: Introduction to Redis
goal: Learn the basics of Redis and how to use it for caching.

title: Introduction to GraphQL
goal: Learn the fundamentals of GraphQL and how to build a GraphQL server.

title: Building a GraphQL API with Node.js
goal: Build a complete GraphQL API with Node.js and Express.js.

title: Introduction to Docker
goal: Learn how to containerize your application with Docker.

title: Introduction to Kubernetes
goal: Learn the basics of Kubernetes for orchestrating containers.

title: Introduction to AWS
goal: Learn the fundamentals of AWS and how to deploy your application.
concepts: Deploying a Node.js application to AWS

title: Advanced Backend Concepts
goal: Learn advanced backend concepts like microservices and message queues.

title: Capstone Project
goal: Build a complete backend application from scratch, applying all the skills you've learned.
